verses.roman:
tumi yāhāṅ kaha, āmi tāhāṅi rahiba
tumi yei ājñā kara, sei ta' kariba

synonyms: tumi—you; yāhāṅ—wherever; kaha—ask; āmi—I; tāhāṅi—there; rahiba—shall stay; tumi—you; yei—whatever; ājñā—order; kara—give; sei—that; ta'-certainly; kariba—I shall execute.
translation: "My dear mother, wherever you ask Me to stay I shall stay, and whatever you order I shall execute."
